description: CJ is back after a harsh defeat from DJ in the oil match. CJ worked on his cardio and picked up a few tips since then. He can't wait to rack up points and gets dirty with some ass fingering, ball grabbing, and face sitting. He takes on fresh meat and NK virgin Adam Knox. Adam is ripped and loves to show off his muscles. Both boys can handle their fair share of pain, which is good, because this is going to be a grueling battle of stamina. The first one to break will be ridden like an animal and take a hard pounding up the ass as his punishment.
title: Adam Knox vs CJ
